help.listevents:
/listevents [number of events] 

/listevents followed by no number will return default number of events
help.addevent:
/addevent [name of event] [date mm/dd/yyyy] [start time XX:XX] [AM/PM] [end time XX:XX] [AM/PM]

If name of event is multiple words long enclose within " " or ' '
help.addeventspan:
/addeventspan [name of event] [start date mm/dd/yyyy] - [end date mm/dd/yyyy]

If name of event is multiple words long enclose within " " or ' '
